attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to ask the goverment to help pubs and cut tax on alcohol. lots of pubs are closing a week already with the smoking ban and putting tax on alcohol up is killing the industry quicker. so im asking for tax to be lowered of alcohol

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
